title: Please Help!!!
body: I lost access to my email on my primary account and i think it was compromised. My password has been changed and i can't do a password recovery/change because I don't have access to the email account that is linked to it. Please help me, i don't know what to do. I've put money into this account. Please please riot, hear me!!!

replies.body:
If your password isn't working and the email was changed, it definitely sounds to me like your account has been compromised {{item:3070}} .

Reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll be able to help get your account back in your hands. Be sure to stay signed out when you submit that ticket!
thank you so much for the hasty response.
